{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.06644v1", "title": "Nonlocal Quasilinear Parabolic Equations in Heisenberg Group: Local
  Boundedness with an Optimal Tail", "summary": "We prove local boundedness for a quasilinear parabolic equation on the
Heisenberg group
  \[
  \partial_t u(\xi,t) + \text{p.v.}\int_{\mathbb{H}^N}
\frac{|u(\xi,t)-u(\eta,t)|^{p-2}(u(\xi,t)-u(\eta,t))}{|\eta^{-1}\circ
\xi|^{Q+sp}} \,d\eta = 0,
  \] with optimal regularity assumption on the tail term. We also prove
interpolation inequalities and an extension theorem for fractional Sobolev
spaces on the Heisenberg group.", "main_category": "math.AP", "categories": "math.AP", "published": "2025-04-09T07:33:02Z"}
